Package org.youscope.common.job

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EditableJobContainer
    A job container allowing to add or remove jobs.
    Job
    Base class of all jobs.
    JobContainer
    A job container is any measurement component which contains jobs.
    JobContainerConfiguration
    Interface each job configuration should implement which contains sub-jobs.
    JobListener
    A listener to get informed about the state of a job.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EditableJobContainerAdapter
    /** Convenient adapter class to implement a job which contains other jobs.
    JobAdapter
    Convenient adapter class to implement a job.
    JobConfiguration
    The abstract superclass of all configurable measurement jobs/tasks which should be activated in regular intervals..
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JobException
    Exception thrown by a job to indicate that its initialization, execution or uninitialization failed.
